response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to extend this offer at a price reflecting its true worth. We kindly propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for both of us to benefit. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
